name: Viquia Memory Game
description:
VIQUIA MEMORY GAME

Viquia shows hidden connections between health care professionals and enables its user to exercise memory.


Rules :

On the screen you can see 48 cards face down, arranged in a 4*12 grid.

The player reveals any card.
After three seconds, all the cards are automatically turned face down again. The player's task is to uncover the previously revealed cards himself.
Only completely revealed groups of cards are included in the scoring. So if a player reveals 2 matching cards before game time ran out, these two points are forfeited.

As soon as player ran out of time, the game is over.
